document_data.name: Rugger Shattershield
document_data.mainbody:
Lord '''Rugger Shattershield''' was a senior member of the noble [[patriar]] [[Shattershield]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] and a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|The [[steel watch]] has made an impregnable fortress out of the Sword Coast's  crown jewel. Can't think of a better endormsent for Gortash than that.|Lord Rugger Shattershield}}
document_data.Description: Rugger was a [[gold dwarf]] with luscious head of pampered brown hair, clean-shaven face, double chin, and hazel eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, shortly before the armies of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] attacked the city of Baldur's Gate, Lord Rugger Shattershield was a Parliamentarian of the Gate who voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord [[Enver Gortash]] as the city's Archduke. Rugger Shattershield was present for Gortash's coronation that took place in the audience hall of [[Wyrm's Rock]]. Following the coronation, he proudly supported the Archduke's steen constructs and the safety they brought in face of a looming war.
